data.title: PROJECT: NEXT
data.description: A comprehensive demonstration of a typical project workflow and the essential dependencies commonly employed in web development. Explore the seamless integration of technologies and gain insights into best practices for efficient development.

cards.title: The Project Workflow: Next JS
